name: MSMessageTemplateLayout
desc: A template-based layout for custom messages.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: An image used to represent the message in the transcript.

items.name: var mediaFileURL: URL?
items.desc: A media file used to represent the message in the transcript.

items.name: var imageTitle: String?
items.desc: The title for the image or media file.

items.name: var imageSubtitle: String?
items.desc: The subtitle for the image or media file.

items.name: var caption: String?
items.desc: A left-aligned caption for the message bubble.

items.name: var subcaption: String?
items.desc: A left-aligned subcaption for the message bubble.

items.name: var trailingCaption: String?
items.desc: A right-aligned caption for the message bubble.

items.name: var trailingSubcaption: String?
items.desc: A right-aligned subcaption for the message bubble.
